scripts.typings:update: npm run typings:prepare && npm run typings:generate
scripts.typings:prepare: npm run build-local-libs && npm run link-local-libs && npm run build-scripts
scripts.build-local-libs: ng build oapi3ts && ng build ng-api-service && ng build oapi3ts-cli
scripts.link-local-libs: mkdir -p node_modules && cd node_modules && touch @codegena && rm -rf @codegena && mv ../../../dist @codegena && cd ..
